name: I.C.O.
description:
I.C.O.

The year is 2███ and the world is overrun by extraterrestrial beings known as the I.C.O. The remains of civilization is locked in a war for survival and they have one trump card in the battle against the I.C.O. threat: The Ferals. 

Judah Bishop, a sea otter who formerly worked in the artillery branch, is a fresh new pilot who is placed into Squad-015. His new life as a Feral pilot takes him across the scarred, desolate surface of the planet and to meet these monstrosities firsthand. And in order to survive, Judah must rely on his team, his wits, and his tenacity.

I.C.O. takes inspiration from a variety of games and anime, most notably Neon Genesis Evangelion, NieR: Automata, and Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann. The hope is to provide an experience which can replicate the epic, emotional heights reached by mecha while also carving out its own identity.
